mapper.insert: insert into WISDOM.DEF$_AQCALL (ENQ_TID, STEP_NO, Q_NAME, CORRID, PRIORITY, STATE, DELAY, EXPIRATION, TIME_MANAGER_INFO, LOCAL_ORDER_NO, CHAIN_NO, CSCN, DSCN, ENQ_TIME, ENQ_UID, DEQ_TIME, DEQ_UID, DEQ_TID, RETRY_COUNT, EXCEPTION_QSCHEMA, EXCEPTION_QUEUE, RECIPIENT_KEY, MSGID, DEQUEUE_MSGID, USER_DATA) values (#{enqTid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{delay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expiration,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{timeManagerInfo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{localOrderNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{chainNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cscn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dscn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{enqTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enqUid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deqTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deqUid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deqTid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{retryCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{exceptionQschema,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exceptionQueue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recipientKey,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{msgid,jdbcType=VARBINARY}, #{dequeueMsgid,jdbcType=VARBINARY}, #{userData,jdbcType=BLOB})
mapper.update: update WISDOM.DEF$_AQCALL set Q_NAME = #{qName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORRID = #{corrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELAY = #{delay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPIRATION = #{expiration,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TIME_MANAGER_INFO = #{timeManagerInfo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOCAL_ORDER_NO = #{localOrderNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHAIN_NO = #{chainNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CSCN = #{cscn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DSCN = #{dscn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ENQ_TIME = #{enqTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ENQ_UID = #{enqUid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEQ_TIME = #{deqTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEQ_UID = #{deqUid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEQ_TID = #{deqTid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RETRY_COUNT = #{retryCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXCEPTION_QSCHEMA = #{exceptionQschema,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXCEPTION_QUEUE = #{exceptionQueue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECIPIENT_KEY = #{recipientKey,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MSGID = #{msgid,jdbcType=VARBINARY}, DEQUEUE_MSGID = #{dequeueMsgid,jdbcType=VARBINARY}, USER_DATA = #{userData,jdbcType=BLOB} where ENQ_TID = #{enqTid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STEP_NO = #{stepNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
